cleaned_text: Balance Complementary Medicine Wellness and Fitness Services Highett, Victoria 21 followers Bring your health back into balance with Chinese medicine, acupuncture and naturopathy. About us Balance Complementary Medicine is a natural healthcare clinic, specialising in Chinese medicine, acupuncture and naturopathy located in the Bayside area, Melbourne. The practitioners at Balance are specialised in treating a wide range of health conditions to help you feel and look your best. We offer fertility acupuncture, IVF acupuncture, cosmetic acupuncture, Bowen therapy and many more natural therapy services. Whether you need help with an existing condition, or you want to find out the cause of your health concerns, we are here to help. We combine cutting-edge techniques with a blend of modern science and ancient wisdom to get results. HICAPS is available on site and our practitioners are accredited providers so if you have private health insurance you may be able to claim on the spot. - Website - [https://balancemed.com.au](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbalancemed%2Ecom%2Eau&urlhash=UXyi&trk=about_website) External link for Balance Complementary Medicine - Industries - Wellness and Fitness Services - Company size - 2-10 employees - Headquarters - Highett, Victoria - Type - Privately Held Locations - Primary 2/1225 Nepean Hwy Highett, Victoria 3190, AU [Get directions](https://www.bing.com/maps?where=2%2F1225+Nepean+Hwy+Highett+3190+Victoria+AU&trk=org-locations_url) Employees at Balance Complementary Medicine - Sophie Gatward Media professional - Clancy Nankervis Doctor of Traditional Chinese Medicine + Founder of chinadoll - chinadoll oriental herbal skincare beautiful everyday skincare created from the wisdom of Chinese Medicine - Juanita Jolly Doctor of Chinese Medicine/Acupuncturist, Naturopathic Physician, Owner & Director at Balance Complementary
